letters.description: Gather comprehensive health history, lifestyle, and current concerns to understand the client's unique needs.
Assess current lifestyle factors (diet, exercise, stress) and relevant lab results to identify potential imbalances.
Evaluate the client's constitution and select appropriate herbal remedies based on their individual profile and imbalances.
Provide ongoing support, education, and personalized dietary/lifestyle recommendations to promote healing and well-being.
Monitor progress, adjust herbal protocols as needed, and empower the client to achieve long-term health goals.
